projects.title: AUTONOMY POWER
projects.subtitle: SOLAR POWER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
projects.description: During my time in ITIO.dev, I was part of developing a solar energy management platform.

longDescription.firstParagraph: Autonomy Power is a cutting-edge solar energy management system designed to optimize and distribute energy efficiently. My role in the project involved full-stack development, implementing test-driven development (TDD), and ensuring the platform maintained high performance and security.
longDescription.secondParagraph: I also worked on CI/CD pipelines, streamlining deployments and automating testing processes. Additionally, I refactored large portions of the codebase to improve maintainability and scalability, ensuring the system's long-term efficiency.

projects.title: PETGEN.ART
projects.subtitle: AI-POWERED IMAGE GENERATOR
projects.description: AI-powered pet image generator creating unique, high-quality pet avatars based on user preferences.

longDescription.firstParagraph: PetGen Art is a platform that leverages artificial intelligence to create unique pet illustrations. My responsibilities included full-stack development, integrating OpenAI’s DALL-E API, and optimizing the system for high performance and scalability.
longDescription.secondParagraph: I implemented TDD to ensure code reliability and utilized CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment. Additionally, I refactored the application to improve efficiency, ensuring seamless AI-generated artwork production.

projects.title: ASUN PAY
projects.subtitle: SECURE PAYROLL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
projects.description: A secure payroll management system automating salary processing and transactions efficiently.

longDescription.firstParagraph: Asun is a cutting-edge web application built using modern technologies like TypeScript, React, and Next.js. My role focused on frontend development, ensuring a seamless user experience and an intuitive interface. I worked extensively on UI/UX design, implementing dynamic layouts and interactive elements that enhance usability. Additionally, I played a key role in maintaining and improving code quality through test-driven development (TDD) and continuous refactoring.
longDescription.secondParagraph: To ensure smooth deployment and scalability, I integrated CI/CD pipelines that automated testing and deployment workflows, reducing manual intervention and increasing efficiency. My contributions also extended to providing technical support and refining project features post-launch, ensuring optimal performance and user satisfaction.

projects.title: AGRISUN ETHIOPIA
projects.subtitle: MARKETING SITE
projects.description: An HTML, CSS, and JavaScript-based site integrated with a CMS, promoting sustainable agricultural solutions.

longDescription.firstParagraph: AgriSun Ethiopia Engineering is a content-driven platform that provides engineering insights and project information. My role focused on frontend development, ensuring a well-structured and user-friendly interface.
longDescription.secondParagraph: I also built the CMS pipeline using Strapi, allowing easy content management and dynamic updates. Additionally, I authored various technical articles to enhance the platform's value and reach.

experiences.title: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
experiences.description: Worked independently on data migration, Salesforce automation, and cloud-based solutions using Python, Google Cloud Platform, and Azure Vector Search. Provided backend and infrastructure support, optimizing workflows and improving data integrity across multiple systems.

experiences.title: TECH LEAD - AGRISUN ENGINEERING
experiences.description: Led the development of technology solutions, from marketing websites to embedded systems for monitoring inverter output, solar energy generation, and water pump efficiency. Designed and deployed software solutions for internal and client-facing applications, integrating IoT for real-time data tracking.

experiences.title: FULL-STACK ENGINEER - ITIO.DEV
experiences.description: Developed and deployed full-stack web applications using the PERN and MERN stacks. Implemented Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices, built scalable front-end solutions, optimized backend performance, and established CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments.

experiences.title: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
experiences.description: Designed and built an embedded system for tracking solar energy metrics, including energy input/output, temperature, humidity, and other environmental factors. Developed a cloud-based platform for real-time monitoring and data visualization.

experiences.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER - SOLARVILLAGE
experiences.description: Developed and maintained the company website, implemented an IT inventory management system, and assisted in hardware installations. Led software solutions for stock tracking and automated reporting while providing IT support and mentoring interns.
